ygData.messageBody:
Well, can only speak for my self and our guild. We hardly ever random for
anything. When i or GM leads an event we just collect the loot, or someone
that we called out collects the loot. Later we divide the loot to people we
feel are worth the loot. We do random a few not so good stuff when they drop
tho, but when it's godly/uber stuff that drops it may even go to someone
that isn't attending that perticular event.

It's hard for me to give another point of view but basicly i wouldnt join a
group unless we divide the loot so that everyone got a chance to get
something, be it a gem or an item, but all should get one thing to bring
home when the group breakes up. Guess i'm saying, random or not, if you won
last random you wount random again till the whole group got something to be
happy over. If it's a class item (read: FBSS to meleer and so on) only the
class that can use it randoms.

-domi

> Hi all,
>
> Since there's been a lot of talk on loot order, I thoguht I'd ask what
> everyone
> uses as a fair assesment for Rolling for loot or how one determines who
> gets a
> particular item.
>
> What I found that seemed to be working well is Blackjack Rolls. Someone
> a long
> while back showed this to me. Basically you roll from 1 to 30. The
> person closest
> to 21 without going over wins. This seems to even out those who
> consistantly average
> low rolls in the 1-100 randoms. In over 2 years of playing and using the
> random 1-100
> i've never won or came close to an upper limit. With blackjack random or
> even a
> raondom 1-100 and the closest to 50 is the winner, seems to average things
> out.
>
> The problem with this is that most people (especially those that
> seemingly roll high)
> love the 1-100 random. When I suggest the mid range win or blackjack
> roll, the first
> time they lose to it, they want to go back to the 1-100 again.
>
> What do you all use as a random or what 'rules' do you use for
> distributing the good
> loot or when using Random?
>
>
> Ciao,
>
> -Knight - I still like BlackJack rolls. I can're remember the guys
